response:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: for(Iterator<Student> it = students.iterator(); it.hasNext(); ){
Student student = it.next();
if (student.getStudentID() == studentID) {
it.remove();
break;
}
}
<<<explanation>>>: You're modifying the list while iterating over it, which causes the ConcurrentModificationException. Instead, you should remove the element from the list after you've checked if it exists.
